name: fladder
description: Fladder is a self-hosted file-sharing platform for sending files quickly and securely via the browser. It supports drag-and-drop uploads and download links with expiration, designed for quick file transfer workflows.
features: File Sharing: Quick browser-based transfers, Drag-and-drop uploads, Expiration links. Fast secure file sharing.
Link Generation: Create shareable download links. Easy distribution.
Expiration Control: Set link lifetimes. Temporary sharing.
Self-Hosted: Private file transfer. No third-party services.
Password Protection: Secure your shares. Controlled access.
Upload Tracking: Monitor file transfers. Usage insights.
Mobile Apps: Android and iOS support. Share anywhere.
Desktop Apps: Native applications. Seamless experience.
Simple UI: Clean interface. Easy to use.
